description: Lists all of the authentication methods supported by the specified application.

parameters.name: ApplicationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application with the authentication methods you want to list.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationMethods
nested_items.description: An array list of authentication methods for the specified application.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationMethodType
nested_items.description: The type of authentication that is used by this method.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationMethod
nested_items.description: A structure that describes an authentication method. The contents of this structure is determined by the AuthenticationMethodType.

nested_items.name: ActorPolicy
nested_items.description: An IAM policy document in JSON.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
